title: Living Alone, Got Fever, Fall In Love
alternative_title: Hitorigurashi, Netsu wo Dasu. Koi wo Shiru. ; 一人暮らし、熱を出す。恋を知る。 ; Жил один, заболел, искупался в любви
status: Hitorigurashi, Netsu wo Dasu. Koi wo Shiru. ; 一人暮らし、熱を出す。恋を知る。 ; Жил один, заболел, искупался в любви
description:
Description :
        The protagonist who caught a cold at Christmas and was absent from work and live alone at his apartement.   
Then, his condition take turn to worse, yet A strange blonde gal suddenly come to take care of him.   
Eh … who? While thinking, She have to nursing myself because of my poor physical condition.   

Indonesian:  
ngekos sendiri, kena demam, trus jatuh cinta sama orang yang ngrawat, dah gitu aja…
